item.title: DANGEROUS - Drain gully collapsed in road by school and shops, 24th July
item.description:
DANGEROUS - Drain gully collapsed in road by school and shops in Gipsy Road. What3Words location: https://w3w.co/launch.dimes.bleat (near Budgens). Collapsed gully grate needs URGENT remedial work to make safe, eg cones and/or plate cover. Very easy for child or mobility scooter or pedestrian to accidently fall or get trapped into the deep gully pit.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 201, Gipsy Road, West Norwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Around 6 Martial Arts ads on footway by 248, High St, Beckenham and opposite on the footway by Sainsbury's., 23rd July
item.description:
There is a proliferation of around 6 advertisement devices on the public footway on both sides of Beckenham High Street (Conservation Area) outside the named advertiser 'London Martial Arts Fitness" at 248, High St, Beckenham and also two large (circa 1.5m x 0.5m) freestanding weighted advertisements on the opposite side of the High St, on the public footway fronting the pedestrian alleyway to Sainsbury's. This half-dozen ads have been there at least 7 days (first seen Friday 18/7/25 and seen today Wednesday 23/7/25. No photographs as seen both tines from a moving vehicle.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 199-203, High Street, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
